Posts.Content: Wow! A 1 inch sore does sound really painful! I am so sorry that you are going through the “side - effects” of Chemo. I feel like they are just prescribing Chemo for a lot of Different Cancers, Anyways, thank you for your reply . God Bless and Good health, Melodee Celise
Posts.Title: I have 3 abscess in my mouth and Doctors want me to start xeloda?

Posts.Content: Capecitabine or Xeloda and mouth soles
Posts.Title: I have 3 abscess in my mouth and Doctors want me to start xeloda?

Posts.Content: I am sorry you are going through this difficult experience! I think I may have the same problem. I actually lost 3-4 teeth while being hospitalized. If there is any thing that you could possibly recamend
Posts.Title: Numb chin
